heroTitle: Test Your Memory, Support Your Country
heroSubtitle: Join the international competition and climb the global leaderboard
visionMissionText: CIPHER is revolutionizing the crypto gaming space by combining cognitive challenges with blockchain technology. Our mission is to create an engaging platform where players from around the world can compete, test their memory skills, and represent their countries in a global competition.
usp1Text: Compete against players worldwide and climb country-based leaderboards
usp2Text: Improve cognitive abilities through challenging color puzzle games
usp3Text: Earn rewards and participate in the token economy
usp4Text: Build connections with players from your country and beyond
goalsText: We aim to create the largest international memory competition platform, fostering healthy competition between nations while building a sustainable crypto ecosystem that rewards skill and dedication.
tokenDistributionText: Our tokenomics are designed to ensure fair distribution and long-term sustainability of the CIPHER ecosystem.
feature1Text: Compete with players worldwide and represent your country
feature2Text: Enhance your cognitive abilities with challenging puzzles
feature3Text: Help your country climb the international rankings
footerSlogan: The ultimate color puzzle crypto game
fillAllFields: Please fill in all fields for registration!
registrationSuccess: Registration successful! You are now logged in.
enterUsernamePassword: Please enter your username and password!
confirmDeleteUser: Are you sure you want to delete this user?
cropperInstructions: Move and scroll to zoom the image.
shareScorePrompt: Here's your score image. Do you want to download it and share on X?
gameMessageMatchColors: Now, match the colors! Select a cell and then a color from the palette.
gameMessageApplyColor: Now click on cells to apply this color.
gameMessageSelectColorFirst: Please select a color from the palette first!
welcomeNotification: Welcome to CIPHER! Are you ready to test your memory and climb the leaderboard? Play now!
developerVestingText: Details about the vesting schedule for project developer tokens will be provided here.
vestingIntro: To ensure the long-term success of the project and build trust, our team tokens are subject to a vesting schedule. This means tokens are released gradually over time, not all at once.
vestingDisclaimer: Note: This table provides a summary. The exact percentages and schedules are defined in the smart contract.
